alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Perkins, southwestern Keith and eastern Deuel Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 930 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Big Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Big Springs, Brule, Barton, Goldeneye State Wildlife Management Area and Megeath. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 75 and 90. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 100 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 300 AM MDT for southwestern Nebraska.
